text: Samuel Baláž (born 25 August 1999) is a Slovak sprint canoeist. He participated at the 2018 ICF Canoe Sprint World Championships.K-4 1000 m results ==References== Category:1999 births Category:Slovak male canoeists Category:Living people Category:ICF Canoe Sprint World Championships medalists in kayak Category:European Games competitors for Slovakia Category:Canoeists at the 2019 European Games Category:European Games medalists in canoeing Category:European Games bronze medalists for Slovakia
title: Samuel Baláž
